doc:
Dody Goodman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dody_Goodman 0 Dody Goodman (October 28, 1914 – June 22, 2008) was an American character actress. She played the mother of the title character in the television series Mary Hartman, Mary Hartman, her distinctive high-pitched voice announcing the show's title at the beginning of each episode. She was a regular on The Tonight Show in the 1950s, and cast member of The Mary Tyler Moore Hour in 1979. Aside from film and television appearances, she also voice acted Miss Miller in the television series Alvin and the Chipmunks and film spin-off The Chipmunk Adventure. Dody_Goodman ( October_28_,_1914 – June_22_,_2008 ) was an_American_character_actress . She played the_mother of the_title_character in the_television_series_Mary_Hartman , Mary_Hartman , her_distinctive_high-pitched_voice announcing the_show 's_title at the_beginning of each_episode . She was a_regular on The_Tonight_Show in the_1950s , and cast member of The_Mary_Tyler_Moore_Hour in 1979 . Aside from film_and_television_appearances , she also voice acted Miss_Miller in the_television_series_Alvin and the_Chipmunks_and_film_spin-off The_Chipmunk_Adventure .
